name: GVSoft Photobox
author: Vladimir Giryavyy

sections.description:
This plugin provides frame for viewing photos and pictures.

Connects to the standard image gallery.

Contains image navigation buttons and a slideshow start/stop button. Easy to adjust.

Features in a Nutshell:

  • Easy installation (just activate the plugin)
  • Easy configuration

Available Languages:

  • English
  • Russian
sections.installation:
Instalation via Admin Panel

  1. Go to Plugins > Add New > Search Plugins enter «GVSoft Photobox»
  2. Find the plugin in search results and install it.

Instalation via FTP

  1. Download the .zip archive
  2. Unzip Plugin
  3. Copy the gvsoft-photobox folder to your wp-content/plugins folder
  4. Activate plugin
  5. (Optional) Adjust settings (Settings -> GVSoft Photobox)
sections.faq:
How can I customize photo block with CSS?

So far, only five settings for the appearance of the frame with the control unit
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Plugin has been added

1.0.1

  • ADD: l10n on plugin page.
  • ADD: keyboard control. Keys to navigate the image gallery:
    ‘up’-last, ‘down’-first, ‘enter’-play/stop slideshow, ‘right’-next, ‘left’-previous;
    ‘esc’-close the photobox.
  • FIX: Minor fixes to js code.

1.2

  • ADD: Animation of old and new image. Configure these settings.

1.2.1

  • FIX: Fixed a hang when gallery item links to attachment page. In this case, the frame will not be called.
  • FIX: Minor fixes to js code.
